medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed abdominal pain yesterday, which has been constant since. This pain is associated with subjective fevers, chills, bilateral lower flank pain, nausea, and diarrhea. The symptoms have gradually progressed over the past day, with a moderate severity. The patient denies any vomiting, cough, dysuria, hematuria, vaginal bleeding or discharge, or any other symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of cholecystectomy and cesarean delivery.
